text: Here is a cool library that can replace wow.js <https://github.com/mamunhpath/josh.js>
client is looking to push an update in their app when their Terms of Service page is updated in the CMS... is there anyway to do this with a webhook or API event or anything?

Not directly, but you could write a microservice to poll the page API at a regular interval and execute your own webhook based on the value of the page's "updated" prop: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/get_pages_page_id>

Hi!  :wave:  We’ve recently been working on some updates that allow developers to set mobile editing controls in the page editor. We are currently in a private beta and are looking for developers that are willing to try out the new functionality. If you’re interested in joining the beta and giving us some feedback, DM me <@U8THBCFC4> and I’ll add you!
